features: Regular fit is just right: Not too tight or too baggy
Dryride Mist-Defy DWR fabric repels water while staying soft and comfortable
Living Lining® provides consistent temperature regulation without adding bulk or weight
Low-bulk Thermolite®[140g]insulation uses 40% recycled material to trap warm air and features a larger surface area to boost moisture evaporation
Drop hem with snap-away feature for extended length and added coverage, Self fabric binding at hem and armhole
Bluesign® approved materials use only safe chemicals and reduce impact on both humans and the planet during manufacturing
